ygData.subject: Re: drinking?
ygData.msgSnippet: It increases STR and STAM and decreases AGI and INT It might effect some others too im not to sure.. its been awhile since i became drunk +AD0-) And just for
ygData.messageBody:
It increases STR and STAM and decreases AGI and INT
It might effect some others too im not to sure.. its been awhile since i became drunk +AD0-)
And just for the record it also messes up depth perseption and movment +AD0-)
----Original Message-----
From: ken satchell +ACI-flash-net +ACY- nikken distrubter+ACI- ken4p+AEA-gvtc.com
To: EQCheats EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com+AD4AOw- EQ+AF8-Monk+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Monk+AEA-onelist.com+AD4AOw- EQ+AF8-Masters+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Masters+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 1:56 PM
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- drinking?


I have heard that drinking increases some stats and decreases others?
Does anyone know what stats and how much?
Does the alcolhol tolerance skill offset any of the penalties if so how much?
What is a good drink for raising skill and a good drink for actual use when going into combat?
Ken
